reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 99/05: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2005 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314, 329.1 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — TIME LIMITS FOR 2005 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314, 329.1 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 99/05: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2005 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314, 329.1 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. (1) The time limits for 2005 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to June 30, 2005. O. Reg. 99/05, s. 1. (2) Despite subsection (1), the time limits for 2005 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to September 30, 2005 for the County of Grey, the Town of Marathon, the Township of Schreiber and the United Counties of Leeds and Grenville. O. Reg. 510/05, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The time limits for 2005 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to June 30, 2005. O. Reg. 99/05, s. 1.

(2) Despite subsection (1), the time limits for 2005 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 308.1 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1), 329.1 (2) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to September 30, 2005 for the County of Grey, the Town of Marathon, the Township of Schreiber and the United Counties of Leeds and Grenville. O. Reg. 510/05, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 99/05, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (revokes other Regulations). O. Reg. 99/05, s. 2.
